item.description:
Its that time of year again, summer sadly is gone...kids are back to school...and work life is beginning to be back to normal....But here at Cocktails and Conversations MA, things are just heating up!!!

What exactly do I mean?

Well, seasons change and so will our Meetup group....I've teamed up with asst. organizer Kevin, to shake and spice things up a bit...while still keeping along the same premise of the group....

What does all this mean to you?

It means..show up to the next C&C and see what's in store....you'll be glad you did!

Come OPEN, Come Relaxed and Come with a little pep in your step!

PS. The $15 fee is for light appitzers and the $5 member dues. Cash Bar

Dani
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where Cocktails & Conversations
item.name: The summer heat is gone but things are just HEATING UP for Sept C&C!
